price: 36. Yallih Dikrit (Qhuraanat) derre cabe numut kaak baxsime waa sheetan kaat naxee, tokkel usuk kay wakliitay kaak baxsime waa kinni.
arabic: وَمَن يَعۡشُ عَن ذِكۡرِ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ نُقَيِّضۡ لَهُۥ شَيۡطَٰنٗا فَهُوَ لَهُۥ قَرِينٞ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.
